article.headline: Chattanooga 108, Ohio Valley 85
article.story: CHATTANOOGA, Tenn. (AP) -- Nicchaeus Doaks scored a career-high 20 points to help Chattanooga win 108-85 over Ohio Valley Saturday night. Doaks led all scorers while Keddric Mays made six 3-pointers, scoring 18 points. Four other Chattanooga players were in double figures. Marcus Watts scored 16 points in his debut and Kevin Bridgewaters added 10 along with five assists. Casey Long and Rickey Hood rounded out the Mocs in double figures with 15 and 11, respectively. Hood's team-high seven rebounds helped the Mocs (1-0) to a 53-32 rebounding advantage. Eighteen turnovers kept Chattanooga from building on a 59-38 halftime advantage. Ohio Valley (0-2) closed the gap to 15 points at 93-78, but could get no closer. The Fighting Scots were 19-of-23 from the free throw line. They also out-shot the Mocs from the floor, making 48.3 percent of their attempts, while the Mocs only managed 44.7 percent. Nathan Cozart led Ohio Valley with 18 points.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
